name: Blomming
overview:
We help people and businesses to sell their products wherever they are online: websites, blogs or Facebook.

Using a single, centralized e-commerce platform they can save time and efforts, preserve their online identities and reach their potential customers where they actually are.

The name comes from “E-commerce made easy as blogging”. Create a Shop on Blomming and, in few minutes, bring it also on your blog, website or Facebook page to sell from there, too. Now available also on iPhone.

Newest release (Mar. 2013) is the Social Affiliation. Now everybody, being a “Social Media Lover” or, better, a blogger, can make money with a simple Like, a Tweet, a Pin, etc. buy simply sharing e-commerce products created by others. Or, of course, with the “Three Shops in one” system powered by Blomming.

This is our view of “Social Commerce”: Publish, Share and Sell. Everywhere.

Cool Vendor in E-Commerce 2012, Gartner, Inc., USA Innovative Niche E-commerce Providers to Watch 2012, Gartner, Inc., USA Best E-Tailer - Best Pure Online Player, Accenture, Italy, 2012 Premio Nazionale per l’Innovazione (National Innovation Prize) 2012, Presidenza della Repubblica, Italia Top 25 Startup, Southern Europe TechTour, 2011 Selected by Seedcamp Jan. 2011.

funding_rounds.source_description: Blomming helps people buy and sell stuff on the social Web, raises $1.65m in funding

milestones.description: Paypal-Blomming: first European implementation of Direct Payments on Facebook
milestones.source_description: first European implementation of Direct Payments on Facebook

milestones.description: Blomming is Cool Vendor in e-commerce 2012 by Gartner
milestones.source_description: Blomming is Cool Vendor in e-commerce 2012 by Gartner

milestones.description: Blomming receives a considerable investment to accelerate its international growth and scale its product and marketing efforts worldwide. The Early Stage round has been made by Vertis Venture
milestones.source_description: Blomming Announces A Relevant Early Stage Investment From Vertis SGR

milestones.description: Earlier in July, Blomming obtained a EUR 1.3 million investment by Vertis Venture. This significant economic boost has allowed Blomming to accelerate its growth path with six new entries.
milestones.source_description: Blomming Gets €1.3 Million Funding, Triples The Growth, Breaks The 10.000 Shop Barrier

milestones.description: Blomming adds another relevant tile to its pervasive Social Commerce strategy: a mobile application for iPhone.
milestones.source_description: Blomming Goes To iPhone, Adds Mobile Commerce To Social Commerce

video_embeds.description: Blomming: Sell and Buy on the Social Web
